findings.lower_thorax: Right upper lobe linear atelectasis. No pleural effusions.
findings.liver: Mild hepatic steatosis. No focal lesion in the visualized liver.
findings.biliary: No ductal dilation. Unremarkable visualized gallbladder.
findings.pancreas: No lesion or ductal dilation. Partial fatty replacement of the dorsal aspect of the pancreatic head, consistent with uneven lipomatosis, benign.
findings.spleen: No splenomegaly. Accessory spleen near the inferior pole.
findings.adrenal_glands: 11 mm discrete right adrenal nodule consistent with a lipid rich adrenal adenoma.
findings.kidneys: 22 mm right interpolar renal cyst likely hemorrhagic. Mild perinephric fluid. No hydronephrosis.
findings.vasculature: Normal signal void in major vasculature.
findings.osseous_and_soft_tissue_structures: Normal bone marrow signal. No soft tissue mass.
